org.grouplens.lenskit.util.io

Class LKFileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.util.io.LKFileUtils

  • public final class LKFileUtils
extends Object

    File utilities for LensKit. Called LKFileUtils to avoid conflict with FileUtils classes that may be imported from other packages such as Guava, Plexus, or Commons.

    Since:
    0.10

    • Method Detail

      • isCompressed

        @Deprecated
public static boolean isCompressed(File file)
        Deprecated. Use CompressionMode or commons-compress facilities instead.

        Query whether this filename represents a compressed file. It just looks at the name to see if it ends in “.gz”.

        Parameters:
        file - The file to query.
        Returns:
        true if the file name ends in “.gz”.

      • openInput

        public static Reader openInput(File file,
                               Charset charset,
                               CompressionMode compression)
                        throws IOException

        Open a file for input, optionally compressed.

        Parameters:
        file - The file to open.
        charset - The character set to use.
        compression - Whether to compress the file.
        Returns:
        A reader opened on the file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error opening the file.

        compression - The compression mode.

        Throws:

        Parameters:
        file - The file to open.
        Returns:
        A reader opened on the input file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error opening the file.
        See Also:
        openInput(File, Charset, CompressionMode), CompressionMode.AUTO, Charset.defaultCharset()

      • byteSource

                                    CompressionMode compression)

        Create a URL-backed byte source.

        Parameters:

        compression - The compression mode.
        Returns:

      • transparentlyDecompress

        public static InputStream transparentlyDecompress(@WillCloseWhenClosed
                                                  InputStream stream)
                                           throws IOException

        Auto-detect whether a stream needs decompression. Currently detects GZIP compression (using the GZIP magic in the header).

        Parameters:
        stream - The stream to read.
        Returns:
        A stream that will read from stream, decompressing if needed. It may not be the same object as stream, even if no decompression is needed, as the input stream may be wrapped in a buffered stream for lookahead.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readIdList

        public static LongList readIdList(File file)
                           throws IOException

        Read a list of long IDs from a file, one per line.

        Parameters:
        file - The file to read.
        Returns:
        A list of longs.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • basename

        public static String basename(String path,
                              boolean keepExt)

        Get the basename of a file path, possibly without extension.

        Parameters:
        path - The file path.
        keepExt - Whether to keep the extension.
        Returns:
        The base name.
